use-ttw: I do not engage with this community
use-mailing-list: I do not engage with this community
use-reddit: I do not engage with this community
use-discord: I read/lurk, but do not post
use-github-discuss: I read/lurk, but do not post
main-use-cases: Note-taking;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content);Worldbuilding (e.g. for role-playing games);Programming
share-wikis: Yes, and I am the only editor/administrator of my wiki(s)
value-of-tw:
I use TiddlyWiki to organize for knowledge collection and sharing, but not on a day to day basis.

Having said that, I do find TiddlyWiki very valuable in how to think about, and organize various topics under a certain subject.
